org.bounswe.digest.api.database

Class CommentJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bounswe.digest.api.database.CommentJDBC

  • public class CommentJDBC
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles database transactions about topic comments.
    Author:
    Kerim Gokarslan, Ozan Bulut
